subject: Re: [junit] Re: Proposed parameterized test syntax for JUnit 4 - Constructor vs Method Parms
msgSnippet: Jeff, In JUnit 4.0, there s not a TestCase class.  Could you elaborate on your idea?  Thanks, David Saff
messageBody:
Jeff,

In JUnit 4.0, there's not a TestCase class. Could you elaborate on your
idea? Thanks,

David Saff

Jeff Grigg wrote:

> --- David Saff <saff@m...> wrote:
> > [...], I find that having the parameters on the constructor
> > reminds me of what's really going on.
>
> Perhaps the Java TestCase constructor could take two parameters:
> java.lang.reflect.Method
> and
> Object[] parameters
> ^- to be used to invoke the test method.
>
>
>
